title: Kobe Bryant: Man. Mamba. Storyteller
description: Kobe Bryant sits down with Cari Champion for one of his first interviews since retirement. In this unedited, extended conversation, the Black Mamba discusses his final 60-point game, thoughts on Steph and LeBron and how he's been spending his time.

itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
